text: Sylvester Robert "Bob" Foley Jr. (born September 19, 1928) is a retired four star admiral in the United States Navy. He was Commander in Chief Pacific from 1982 to 1985. He was born in Manchester, New Hampshire. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Military people from New Hampshire Category:People from Manchester, New Hampshire
title: Sylvester R. Foley Jr.
